message.entry: Specify either scale factor or output size or enable reference input at the input.
{0} must be a scalar or a 2-element row vector.
{0} must be a scalar or a 3-element row vector.
'Name' value must be a character vector or string scalar.
When NaN specified in 'OutputSize', there must be exactly {0} NaN entry.
Input to ''{0}'' layer must have two spatial dimension labels.
Inputs with more than four dimensions are not supported by ''{0}'' layer. Use resize3dLayer instead.
Input to ''{0}'' layer must have three spatial dimension labels.
Inputs with more than five dimensions are not supported by ''{0}'' layer.
Expected input to be of dlarray type, instead its type was {0}.
